thread.title: TRUMP VOWS BIG TAX CUT COMING...
thread.title_full: TRUMP VOWS BIG TAX CUT COMING...

title: TRUMP VOWS BIG TAX CUT COMING...
text: 'It's big league': Trump promises a 'phenomenal' tax cut plan for businesses in coming week - as stocks notch record close in anticipation President Trump told airline executives a tax cut plan is 'coming along very well' He said the plan would lower the burden on business 'big league' He said an announcement was coming in two or three weeks Trump also complained that the U.S. didn't keep 'even a tiny oil well' after leading an international coalition to overthrow the government in Iraq Wall Street rallied on the news
